extendedInfo.description: Offline Shelf Help directly on your phone for all shelf apps* View help for any of the shelf apps  - mobile view or full web view  - help for export, import  - all settings explained  - screen by screen help for all menu options and actions  - * Integrated into main shelf screens  - link to the exact help for the app and screen  - links from help menu or action toolbar  - offline help can be set as default help location in the shelf apps* SD Card Support  - move the application  - installs to SD card where possiblePermissions required:Full Internet - for app sync (and ads)Please email all suggestions or queries (and problems) to dionhardy200@googlemail.com
